name: Cat on Trip
description:
In this fun adventure game, you start off as a tiny kitten who receives news about your brother who has been hospitalized. In order to find your way to your brother and navigate your way there as quickly as possible, you take a special catnip that grants you powers you have never had before. But, there is a CATch! In order to keep these powers, you have to lose your sanity, but be careful, lose all of it and you will never see your brother again. Good luck little kittens! 

Our attempt at Gamecraft 2021. Our team had a lot of challenges such as two of our members serving national service and another member overseas. Despite all that, it was a fun experience.

Controls:

  • Enter to interact/attack
  • WASD to move
  • Shift to Dash/Special Ability
  • Space to jump

Members:

  • Angie (Programmer, Exco)
  • Javier (Designer, Programmer)
  • Gideon (Programmer)
  • Suwolle (Artist)
  • Celest (Sounds)

Special thanks to:

  • Hubert (Additional Sounds)
  • Mimpy (Additional Art)
